title: Can Shein Improve Garment Workers' Lives Without the 'Flashy PR Play'?
body: In a new press release, the e-tail juggernaut extols its investments in factory upgrades and quality-of-life improvements in southern China. But is it all as it seems?

title: Step Into Panem: SHEIN and Lionsgate Drop The Hunger Games Collection
body: Today, global fashion and lifestyle online retailer SHEIN, announced the launch of its The Hunger Games franchise collection in collaboration with Lionsgate. The limited-edition collaboration fuses fashion,
